tooltip.minecardmod.betting_license: Use this to play against villagers to win emeralds
tooltip.minecardmod.minecard_pack_card: Open this to add more cards to your collection!
tooltip.minecardmod.cards.zombie: ETB: Play every zombie from your hand and deck.
tooltip.minecardmod.cards.bat2: ETB: Your opponent draws a card.
tooltip.minecardmod.cards.creeper: Explodes if another mob is placed in the melee zone.
tooltip.minecardmod.cards.mushroom_cow: ETB: Generate a mushroom soup in your hand
tooltip.minecardmod.cards.mushroom_soup1: Mushroom soup: Fully heal an entitiy and add §43 strength§r
tooltip.minecardmod.cards.mushroom_soup2: Fully heal an entitiy and add §43 strength§r
tooltip.minecardmod.cards.red_dragon: Discard a card to play Red dragon.
tooltip.minecardmod.cards.villager: ETB: Gain §a4E§r, then you may spend §a5E§r to draw a card.
tooltip.minecardmod.cards.chicken: Summon another chicken at the start of each of your actions.
tooltip.minecardmod.cards.killer_bunny2: ETB: Kill all entities with 3 or less strength.
tooltip.minecardmod.cards.allay: Gain §a3E§r at the start of each of your actions.
tooltip.minecardmod.cards.slime: Gain §41 strength§r at the start of each action.
tooltip.minecardmod.cards.magma_slime: Gain §43 strength§r at the start of each action.
tooltip.minecardmod.cards.snow_golem2: Deal §41 damage§r to each enemy mob.
tooltip.minecardmod.cards.phantom_swarm: Whenever an oponents mob enters the battlefield summon a phantom
tooltip.minecardmod.cards.piglin: Deal §43 damage§r any amount of times while paying §a2E§r each.
tooltip.minecardmod.cards.bucket: Deal §45 damage§r, heal all damage and put out all fires on friendly entities or blink a mob.
tooltip.minecardmod.cards.bucket1: Heal all damage and put out all fires on friendly entities.
tooltip.minecardmod.cards.blaze: Set an enemy mob on fire.
tooltip.minecardmod.cards.witch: Draw a card whenever you play a potion.
tooltip.minecardmod.cards.carpet_bombing: Sacrifice a mob to deal §420 damage§r.
tooltip.minecardmod.cards.shulker: Return target mob to its owners hand
tooltip.minecardmod.cards.enderman: Return this mob to your hand when targeted.
tooltip.minecardmod.cards.ender_pearl_st: Return one of your mobs to your hand
tooltip.minecardmod.cards.copper_golem: Search your deck for a lighting card.
tooltip.minecardmod.cards.nether_portal: Search your deck for a nether card.
